channel.title: Who would you have lunch with, and who would you fight, on the forums
channel.description:
I was curios as to who people would like to have lunch with, or beat the shit out of, on these forums
Example: Tree would have lunch with Miss Silabsoft
Or.. MybJames would beat the shit out of me etc etc..
It's meant to be more of a joke than a serious manner, though.
[size=7pt][b]Edited to explain what the thread is about in the title.[/b][/size]

item.title: Who would you have lunch with, and who would you fight, on the forums
item.dc:creator: @Bebemycat2 Bebe
item.description:
@Bebemycat2 wrote:

[quote=“Cheesehunk, post:91, topic:124880”]Hmm, nice question.
I’d have lunch with Wizzup, Megan, PaulT, Star, Mopar, Pyro (Pyro_910 from Kaitnieks,) and Kane.

I would probably invite Pwnd. Then leave razors at the table and watch from a couple tables over reading the latest predicament Herman got himself into in the daily comics. Only to see if all the emo rumors are true, as long as Kane doesn’t show up, his depression would takeover.[/quote]
Yeah I would definitely have lunch with Wade
I don’t know about Wizzy, me and him aren’t getting along too well lately

Read full topic
